get0: Whoa, that was quite a fall just now!
Huh, a little cat? Guess your legs just saved you a life!
Hmm, who an I? I am Number 0, the elder of the Numeric Village up above.

And why am I in this cave? It's because those folks called Industrial Conversion Corporation.
They're wreaking havoc on our village up there!
Now, I'm on the hunt for someone who can push those fellows out.
I know you're not one of us numbers, but maybe you can do what we can't.
Keep walking, I'll help you open the door out of this cave.
get1: A cat? How can a cat come all the way here?
Wait, if you're here, you probably know how to get out, right?
I have been here for days, trying to get out of this narrow pathway.
May I follow you? I'll help you back later, for sure!
get2: Tell me, how can you go past that water stream? It's hard like rock, I can't even go back!
Oh, you stopped the stream from above? What a brilliant cat you are!
It's dark for a cat down here. Let me help you open the gate to the outside.
